name: Mischievous Tail
summary: Your tail can bedevil your foes.
description:
Your tail can bedevil your foes. You can Disarm and Trip creatures with your tail, even if you don't have a free hand. All restrictions of Skillful Tail otherwise continue to apply. If you have Smashing Tail, your tail unarmed attack gains the disarm and trip traits.Traits

Ganzi: A planar scion descended from a chaotic being of the Maelstrom, such as a protean
